short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn on/off your Elgato Key Light Air when you join/leave a Google Meet call.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Light Sync is your perfect companion for enhanced video conferencing!

Seamlessly integrate your Google Meet experience with smart lighting control. Forget about manual on/off and let automation do that for you!

Turn on/off your Elgato Key Light Air when you join/leave a Google Meet call.
